meanings.definition: A small burrowing mammal with long ears, soft fur, and a short tail.
meanings.sent1: The rabbits hopped around the garden.
meanings.sent2: I saw some cute rabbits at the petting zoo.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a rabbit out of his hat.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as quick as a rabbit's hop.
meanings.sent5: The children giggled as they chased the fluffy rabbits.

meanings.sent1: She rabbits to catch the bus every morning.
meanings.sent2: The squirrel rabbits up the tree to escape the cat.
meanings.sent3: He rabbits through his homework before dinner.
meanings.sent4: Time rabbits by when you're having fun.
meanings.sent5: The wind rabbits through the trees on a stormy night.
